sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GNOME Libraries package contains libgnome, libgnomeui, libgnomesupport, libart_lgpl, libgtk-xmhtml, libgnorbagtk and libzvt libraries.

sect3.title: libgnome
sect3.para: libgnome library is the non-GUI part of the GNOME library.

sect3.title: libgnomeui
sect3.para: libgnomeui is the GUI part of the GNOME library.

sect3.title: libart_lgpl
sect3.para: libart_lgpl library is the LGPL component of libart.

sect3.title: libgnorbagtk
sect3.para: libgnorbagtk is the GNOME CORBA GTK framework.

sect3.title: libzvt
sect3.para: libzvt library provides the functions necessary to emulate xterm.
